channel.title: Laxman Jhula on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in Laxman Jhula on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: Day 3 - Rishikesh
item.description: The weather looked gloomy with an overcast sky as we woke up. We had breakfast at the hotel and decided to visit Rishikesh today. Again we headed back the way we came yesterday and after crossing Rajaji National Park the road divides and one goes towards to Dehradun and one to Rishikesh. The drive was pleasant, as we opted Laxman Jhula as our destination google map smartly took us via highway bypassing the main city.
